texasholdemsample

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdemsample.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a deck of 52 cards. The deck appears shuffled by drawing random cards. Each card can only be drawn once.
    Author:
    John Wardell

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        Draws 1 Card in random order. Decrements remainingCards and puts chosen card out of range to be chosen again.
        Returns:
        the Card drawn
